attributes.additional_details: If you've got experience working with agency's you'll probably feel like I do, Fedup. agencies nowdays are just bully's that play with your life, randomly "lay" you off, or you get paid less cause these greedy people take all the extra money and pay us NMW. They need clamping down on, to protect the working public. No more bullies, no more lies, Straight talking people & honest jobs!
attributes.background: How many people have seen a job advertised by a agency travelled a good distance just to be told your now on awaiting list? How many people are paid less cause they work for the agency? It's a huge problem that needs tackling there out of control!
